title: Teaching Assistant
description: Assisting in grading assignments, holding office hours, and supporting students in understanding course material.

title: TEP Website Development
description: Developing and maintaining the TEP website to keep information fresh, accessible, and easy to navigate.
overview: The TEP Website project delivers a modern, responsive site for the Teaching and Engagement Program. The team restructured content, implemented reusable web components, and built a JSON-driven workflow so updates stay simple.
outcomes: Designed a reusable component library for navigation and hero sections
Connected project and member profiles through shared JSON data

title: Green House Monitoring System
description: Implementing a smart monitoring system for greenhouses using IoT devices and data analytics.
